Detailed Description

Parser class to load configuration from file and perform differencing configuration update.

/section How it works # For each section: RouterOS::getall items from RouterOS # ignore all dynamic entries, remove all invalid entries # try to classify RouterOS item to either ignore or to pass list # try to match RouterOS item with local item using defined keys, if no match found remove, if match found update only what changed # reorder RouterOS item list # add not found items to RouterOS
